msbt.message: Been waitin' for ya, kiddo! Back for that sparkler, I take it?
There you go. I know it ain't much, but I think they're pretty fun.Now we can have us a big show up above and a little one down below. This oughta be a hoot, !
Now hang on! Your pocket situation ain't changed a wit. They're still just as full as last time, .I'm not gonna give you this sparkler till that gets addressed, so hop to it!
Hey there, kiddo! How'd you like a sparkler? 'Cause I just happen to have one here for ya!
If it ain't ! Let me stand up real quick.
Hello again! Hold on one second. I wanna stand up.
